Description: Trial Number (indexed separately by task vs. distractor)
Block type of trial
Levels: {"MEMORIZE": "Memorize Face / name pairs", "RECALL":"Recall Face / name pairs", "GoNogoDistractor": "Distraction blocks"}

Description: Filename of presented stimulus image (face or shape)
Text displayed during trial ("Name" during MEMORIZE blocks or "???" during RECALL blocks)
Start Time of countdown number display
Number shown for start of task countdown
Start time of block cue presentation
End time of block cue presentation
Start time of face presentation
End time of face presentation
Start time of Go/Nogo Distractor Shape
Start time of Go/Nogo Distractor Shape
Start time of Go/Nogo Distractor Fixation
Start time of Go/Nogo Distractor Fixation
End Time of Run (run duration)
Press indicator - blank if no response or "press" if participant responded
List of all presses occuring during trial
List of all press RTs occuring during trial relative to start of trial ("faceStartTime")
GNG Expected Correct Answer (1 during go trials, blank during  nogo trials)
GNG Expected ISI
List of all presses occuring during GNG trial
Outcome of GNG Trial
List of all press RTs occuring during GNG trial
List of all presses occuring during GNG fixation
List of all press RTs occuring during GNG fixation. Total fixation range is variable and determined by column ISI
Current Run
Internal indicator for scan vs. behavioral practice task version
Levels: {"scan":"Task is run in the scanner; wait for trigger", "practice":"Task is run as practice"}

Description: Measured Frame Rate (psychopy)
Short Experiment Label
"Real-world" time at which current run's trigger was received
Counterbalance order
Task Version (git commit short hash)
Date-time experiment script was launched (multiple runs will share date)
Subject Session Identifier
